application.desc: GROBID - A machine learning software for extracting information from scholarly documents
application.label: unknown

startPage=-1, endPage=-1, consolidateCitations=1, consolidateHeader=1, consolidateFunders=0, includeRawAffiliations=false, includeRawCitations=true, includeRawCopyrights=false, generateTeiIds=false, generateTeiCoordinates=[], flavor=null

div.p: We will be able to publish 2 papers with results from this experiment: one paper will be about the development of solid state lubricants from layered oxides (tentative publishing date 2015), the other paper about the mechanism of exfoliation of titania nanosheets (tentative publishing date end 2014), both in chemistry of materials journals.

figure.figDesc: the obtained results at this stage in line with the expected results as mentioned on the project proposal? YES 6. Are you planning follow-up experiments at DUBBLE for this project? YES 7. Are you planning experiments at other synchrotrons in the near future? NO 8. Do you expect any scientific output from this experimental session (publication, patent, ...) YES.

note.p: For more information please contact the secretariat, tel.: +31-70-3494011, e-mail: dubble@nwo.nl December 2012
